summary: An altruistic department-store owner hires ex-convicts in order to give them a second chance at life. Unfortunately, one of the convicts he hires recruits two of his fellow ex-convicts in a plan to rob the store.
cast: Sylvia Sidney|George Raft|Barton MacLane|Harry Carey|Roscoe Karns|George E. Stone|Warren Hymer|Robert Cummings|Adrian Morris|Roger Gray|Cecil Cunningham|Vera Gordon|Egon Brecher|Willard Robertson|Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams|Bernadene Hayes|Joyce Compton|Carol Paige|Ernie Adams|Sam Ash|Max Barwyn|Harlan Briggs|Marie Burton|Ethel Clayton|Sheila Darcy|William B. Davidson|Hal K. Dawson|Dorothy Dayton|Paula DeCardo|Richard Denning|Jane Dewey|Ellen Drew|Jimmie Dundee|Yvonne Duval|Fern Emmett|Julia Faye|Greta Granstedt|Joe Gray|Kit Guard|Harriette Haddon|Oscar 'Dutch' Hendrian|Robert Homans|Arthur Hoyt|John Hubbard|Barbara Jackson|Lola Jensen|Gwen Kenyon|Herta Lynd|Joyce Mathews|John McCafferty|Matt McHugh|James McNamara|Ray Middleton|Helaine Moler|Jack Mulhall|Paul Newlan|Carol Parker|Edward Pawley|Jack Pennick|Juanita Quigley|Margaret Randall|Ruth Rogers|Barbara Salisbury|Louise Seidel|Harry Tenbrook|Archie Twitchell|Blanca Vischer|Cheryl Walker|Phil Warren|Marion Weldon
title: You and Me
